name: PONG (itch) (Bedethi)
description:
This game is a varian of pong, where the prupose of the game is mix Angry Birds and Pong, so... It's done, now in this game you can throw the ball to your opponent. Also I added 3 more scenes in addition to the classic one.

This is my first videogame, it was made for a subject of my university, it's not the best game and It'll probably have some bugs, but as far as I have seen and reviewed It's ok and playable, hope you enjoy my first creation, let me know what do you think about it.

If you want to help me by donating you can do it here: ko-fi.com/bedethi
